alert.note: Alert for Anne Arundel; Central and Southeast Howard; Central and Southeast Montgomery; Northwest Howard; Northwest Montgomery; Prince Georges; Southern Baltimore (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 02 at 12:03PM EST until January 03 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 1 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of The District of Columbia, central and northern Maryland and northern Virginia. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 1 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Anne Arundel; Central and Southeast Howard; Central and Southeast Montgomery; Northwest Howard; Northwest Montgomery; Prince Georges; Southern Baltimore
